titles.title: A bill to amend the Financial Stability Act of 2010 to include the State insurance commissioner as a voting member of the Financial Stability Oversight Council, and for other purposes.
Primary Regulators of Insurance Vote Act of 2019
Primary Regulators of Insurance Vote Act of 2019
Primary Regulators of Insurance Vote Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Primary Regulators of Insurance Vote Act of 2019
This bill establishes a state insurance commissioner as a voting member of the Financial Stability Oversight Council. The member is appointed by the President with the advice and consent of the Senate. Under current law, this member is nonvoting and selected by state insurance commissioners.
